metadata.title: Puy Lentil and Aubergine Stew
metadata.description: A hearty stew made with Puy lentils, aubergines, and a blend of Middle Eastern spices, perfect as a starter, side, or main dish.
notes: Few things bring me more pleasure in the kitchen than taking a set of familiar ingredients and seeing them in a new light. It’s happened here with this stew and also the Puy lentil and aubergine dish. The two ingredients lists are very similar – the aubergine, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic and oregano. Both dishes – though equally delicious – are completely different from one another. It’s one of the many reasons I love aubergines: they’re so versatile and can be cooked in such different ways to yield such different results. Serve the stew either as a hearty starter or a side, or else as a main, served with any grain you like. The stew can be made up to 3 days ahead and kept in the fridge – just warm through and add the crème fraîche, oil, chilli flakes and oregano before serving.
metadata.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

steps.action: Heat 2 tbsp of olive oil in a large, high-sided sauté pan over medium-high heat.

output_state.name: Hot Oil
output_state.description: Oil is heated and ready for sautéing.

steps.action: Add garlic, onion, thyme, and ¼ tsp of salt to the hot oil and sauté for 8 minutes, stirring often, until soft and golden.

output_state.name: Sautéed Garlic and Onion
output_state.description: Garlic and onion are soft and golden, infused with thyme and salt.

steps.action: Transfer the garlic and onion mixture to a bowl, leaving the oil behind. Set aside.

output_state.name: Reserved Garlic and Onion
output_state.description: Garlic and onion mixture is set aside in a bowl.

steps.action: Season aubergines and tomatoes with ¼ tsp of salt and plenty of pepper.

output_state.name: Seasoned Aubergines and Tomatoes
output_state.description: Aubergines and tomatoes are seasoned with salt and pepper.

steps.action: Add the remaining 1 tbsp of oil to the same pan and heat until very hot.

output_state.name: Hot Oil in Pan
output_state.description: Pan is heated with the remaining oil.

steps.action: Add the aubergines and tomatoes to the hot pan and fry for 10 minutes on medium-high heat, turning often until the aubergine is soft and golden-brown and the tomatoes are beginning to blacken.

output_state.name: Cooked Aubergines and Tomatoes
output_state.description: Aubergines are soft and golden-brown, tomatoes are beginning to blacken.

steps.action: Return the garlic and onion to the pan, then add the lentils, stock, wine, 450ml of water and ¾ tsp of salt.

output_state.name: Stew Base
output_state.description: All ingredients are combined in the pan, ready for simmering.

steps.action: Bring the stew to a boil.

output_state.name: Boiling Stew
output_state.description: Stew is boiling and ready to simmer.

steps.action: Lower the heat to medium and simmer gently for 40 minutes, until the lentils are soft but still retain a bite.

output_state.name: Simmered Stew
output_state.description: Lentils are soft but still retain a bite, stew is ready to serve.

steps.action: Serve the stew warm, or at room temperature, with a dollop of crème fraîche, a drizzle of oil, chilli flakes, and oregano on top.

output_state.name: Puy Lentil and Aubergine Stew
output_state.description: The stew is served warm or at room temperature, topped with crème fraîche, olive oil, chilli flakes, and oregano. It can be enjoyed as a hearty starter, side, or main dish.

final_state.name: Puy Lentil and Aubergine Stew
final_state.description: The stew is served warm or at room temperature, topped with crème fraîche, olive oil, chilli flakes, and oregano. It can be enjoyed as a hearty starter, side, or main dish.
